Request For Quotations
About Enernovo.com

Enernovo.com is built up to bring innovative supply chain solutions and value-added services to the oil and gas industry, to enable the industry to discover, evaluate, and acquire chemicals in a more transparent, efficient and sustainable way.

Our team is comprised of a diverse group of professional talented people, a combination of the supply chain management, long tenured energy veteran, international business and sourcing professionals. We know the difficulty and challenge in the supply chain, especially for the international procurement and deliveries, we have done this and know what it takes.

Mission

Provide innovative supply chain solutions and services to help oilfield operations achieve greater efficiency and productivity.

Vision

Provide innovative supply chain solutions and services to help oilfield operations achieve greater efficiency and productivity

Value

Be Reliable
